name: package-bump-tag-commit
description: Read version from package file, bump it, and create tag, commit
author: Sergio Garcia

scripts.release:prepare: npm run build && git add dist/ && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "build: update dist for release"
scripts.release:update-major: git tag -f v1 && git push -f origin v1
scripts.release:full: npm run release:prepare && npm run release:tag && npm run release:update-major
scripts.bump:patch: npm run version:patch && git push origin master && npm run release:full
scripts.bump:minor: npm run version:minor && git push origin master && npm run release:full
scripts.bump:major: npm run version:major && git push origin master && npm run release:full
scripts.tag:delete: git tag -d v%npm_package_version% && git push --delete origin v%npm_package_version%
